text: Build your feed by selecting the % composition of each ingredient to the left, or by selecting a preset diet to start with. Use the checkbox below the plot to see how well your feed fulfils the digestible nutritional requirements of farmed Atlantic salmon.

The table below shows what categories of feed ingredient are contributing to the total and digestible portions of your feed. For example, the marine-dominant feed preset is 52.8% marine-sourced ingredients. However, because the plant-derived ingredients within it are higher in protein than fishmeal, 52.2% of the total protein within the feed is from plant-derived ingredients. Plant-derived ingredients are slightly less digestible, however, so overall 52% of the digestible protein comes from plant-derived ingredients.
